0: Clear AI provider abstraction using factory pattern and interface-based design (src/ai/providers/), enabling easy switching between OpenAI and Anthropic
1: Well-defined domain services structure (src/domain/services/) separating file watching, incremental analysis, and test configuration concerns
2: Proper separation of webview concerns (src/ui/webview/) with base provider and template engine for reusable UI components
3: Repository pattern implementation (src/infrastructure/persistence/analysisResultRepository.ts) for data access abstraction
4: Bootstrap/initialization logic properly isolated (src/domain/bootstrap/) with command registry and extension bootstrapper
5: Rate limiting and retry mechanisms (src/ai/llmRateLimiter.ts, llmRetryHandler.ts) for resilient AI provider integration
6: JSON schema validation (src/llmSchemas.ts) for structured AI responses
7: Incremental storage system (src/storage/incrementalStorage.ts) for efficient caching of analysis results
